'''Retarded Creatures and Caverns''' is a parody of [[the Lord of the Rings]] written by [[John Wilson]]<ref name="Tolkien Games" /><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi Retarded Creatures and Caverns] at [[Wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=4 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 4 (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref>. It the sequel of [[An Everyday Tale of a Seeker of Gold]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/retarded.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref> It was not part of [[the Balrogian Trilogy]], but was included in the collections ''Best of the Indies Vol. 1'', ''Balrog's Big Four,'' and ''Numero Dos''.

== Story ==
''Bulbo'''s old friend ''Algernon'', also called ''Stroller'', embark on a quest to investigate a castle called ''Toidi'' and slay the dragon that dwells within it.<ref name="Tolkien Games" />
